cash cow.translation[0].definitions[0].d: something that a company sells very successfully and that brings in a lot of money
cash cow.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a very profitable business or part of a business
cash cow.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Mail order should be seen as a cash cow that will generate cash for further moves into information services.
GM and Ford have used luxury cars as cash cows; giving those up could have a terrible impact on profitability.
cash cow.translation[1].definitions[1].d: in the GROWTH/SHARE MATRIX, a product with high market share in a low-growth market
